resources.string: *කොටු සියල්ලම පුරවන්න. \n *අක්ෂර වින්‍යාසය ගැන සැලකිලිමත් වන්න.

1) Select a puzzle from the menu.
 2) Fill the puzzle.
 3) You can navigate through boxes using arrow keys.
 4) You can see the clues by clicking Across and Down buttons.
 5) After filling the boxes, click check answers button to check the correct answers.
 6) If all the answers are correct, the next puzzle will unlock.
